roleset.name: to walk at a leisurely pace

roles.note: Use ArgMs for destination (gol) and direction.

example.name: transitive
example.text: You catch the first flight to Macau in the morning , stop at the Westin for a coffee and to talk business , head to one of the outlying islands in the afternoon for a round of golf , take a stroll downtown , and return to Taiwan that evening .
example.note: Downtown is loc because it is the underspecified location of walking, like "walking around" downtown.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: They waved and said hello as she continued her stroll of the grounds.

roleset.note: Based on verb entry stroll.01; corresponds to Vncls run-51.3.2.
